channel.title: random on The Chief's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in random on The Chief's Blog

item.title: Housing Market
item.description: Housing Madness My wife found a house she likes for sale today. Asking price around $550K. House has been on the market for one day. The realtor told her there are already 60 visits scheduled. There are only 2 spots left. You only get 15 mins, and only one person can visit per household. This is depressing.

item.title: What do you know?
item.description: What do you know? Today, I had this exchange with a fellow fintwitter: The highlighted statement reminds sounds to me like: “I know that Jesus will come back” I guess people like to use the word “know” to make their convictions sound like certainties. As of today, although it’s likely that Bitcoin will play some kind of role in the future, there is nothing knowable about what that role will be.
